segments.text: When can I get high speed internet installed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're going to have to make an appointment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I make one right now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When would you like the installation to be done ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The only time we can come on Friday is at 3
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to need it installed earlier than that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , but we're booked up on Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Saturday is perfect . What time would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's perfect . See you on Saturday .
segments.speaker: S2
